Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?  How to remove pre-installed apps like Peep and Friend Stream from my HTC phone?There are alot of stock android apps on my phone like Email, News and Weather etc. that I dont use. I really need the space because my phone is running low on memory so I am wondering if there is a way to uninstall them because I dont see that option in the Manage apps section.
Title: How can I remove system apps / stock apps?

history.Text: There are alot of stock android apps on my phone like Email, News and Weather etc. that I dont use. I really need the space because my phone is running low on memory so I am wondering if there is a way to uninstall them because I dont see that option in the **Manage apps** section.
How can I remove system apps / stock apps?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/6851/how-can-i-uninstall-applications-that-are-locked-by-phone-vendor)  There are alot of stock android apps on my phone like Email, News and Weather etc. that I dont use. I really need the space because my phone is running low on memory so I am wondering if there is a way to uninstall them because I dont see that option in the **Manage apps** section.
